thread.title: Bill Plaschke's Wakeup Call: USC is stuck between a rock and a hard place
thread.title_full: Bill Plaschke's Wakeup Call: USC is stuck between a rock and a hard place

title: Bill Plaschke's Wakeup Call: USC is stuck between a rock and a hard place
text:
Steve Sarkisian Bill Plaschke's Wakeup Call: USC is stuck between a rock and a hard place 
USC has placed head football coach Steve Sarkisian on leave to address his personal problems. But L.A. Times sports columnist Bill Plaschke believes the athletic director has more to answer than Sarkisian does.
